mapper.select: SELECT m.user_no AS userNo, e.map_no AS mapNo, h.hotplace_no AS hotplaceNo, h.hotplace_name AS hotplaceName, e.review AS review, m.recom AS recomm, h.sido AS sido, h.gugun AS gugun, h.address AS address, h.lat AS lat, h.lng AS lng, AVG(COALESCE(e.emo_result, 0)) AS avgEmoResult, hc.hotplace_cate_no AS hotplaceCategoryNo FROM emoreview e JOIN hotplace h ON e.hotplace_no = h.hotplace_no JOIN mymap m ON e.map_no = m.map_no JOIN hotplace_cate hc ON h.hotplace_cate_no = hc.hotplace_cate_no WHERE m.user_no = #{userNo} GROUP BY h.hotplace_no, h.hotplace_name, h.address, h.sido, h.gugun, h.lat, h.lng, e.review, e.map_no, m.user_no, m.recom, hc.hotplace_cate_no
